description:
A Fleet Management Service for monitoring Global Merchant Fleet vessel position using satellite and terrestrial AIS and Captain’s Report.

Netpas Vessel Monitor AIS is a Fleet Management Service for monitoring Global Merchant Fleet vessel position using satellite and terrestrial AIS and Captain’s Report. It is more than a real-time vessel tracking service but also manages your vessels from chartering to operation. NVM AIS is suitable for the users who want to monitor vessel's movement with minimum information. And it's more useful for the users who want to analyze and build up the record of the voyage and vessel performance. Simply find your vessel and start monitoring using Netpas AIS. Netpas will analyze and update the vessels' positions through map with details such as current ROB, ETA, and etc. Furthermore, NVM AIS produces and saves the detailed Voyage Report as well as Fleet Status Reports automatically for your efficient vessel management.
